query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS escalation_webhook_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  webhook_config_id INT NOT NULL,
  escalation_history_id INT,
  escalation_level INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  alert_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT,
  channel_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  request_payload TEXT,
  response_status INT,
  response_body TEXT,
  success BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  sent_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_webhook_log_config (webhook_config_id),
  INDEX idx_webhook_log_escalation (escalation_history_id),
  INDEX idx_webhook_log_sent (sent_at)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS escalation_webhook_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  webhook_config_id INT NOT NULL,
  escalation_history_id INT,
  escalation_level INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  alert_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT,
  channel_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  request_payload TEXT,
  response_status INT,
  response_body TEXT,
  success BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  error_message TEXT,
  sent_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_webhook_log_config (webhook_config_id),
  INDEX idx_webhook_log_escalation (escalation_history_id),
  INDEX idx_webhook_log_sent (sent_at)
);
